Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
To complete your request for a Trademark Statement of Use Extension, the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) needs to know why you are filing this request. Please reply and indicate which of the reasons below apply to you:
• Product or service research or development • Market research • Manufacturing activities • Promotional activities • Steps to acquire distributors • Steps to obtain required governmental approval • Other (include explanation)
Please note: We will not be able to process with your order until this information is received.
If you have any questions or would like additional information, simply reply to this email or call us at (800) 773-0888 Monday–Friday from 6 a.m.–7 p.m. PT. We appreciate you choosing LegalZoom and look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
